basics.name: Name Not Provided
basics.label: Information Technology Professional
basics.summary: Dedicated Information Assurance Professional well-versed in analyzing and mitigating risk and finding cost-effective solutions. Excels at boosting performance and productivity by establishing realistic goals and enforcing deadlines.Versatile IT professional with 37 years of Enterprise design and engineering methodology.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed accreditation efforts for major department modernization project. Coordinated with ONI Enterprise in critical design decisions. Analyzed complex computer systems to assess vulnerability and risk. Supervised 5 external computer consultants and vendors. Managed application patches, data backup, security changes and network configuration.
highlights: Coordinated with ONI Enterprise in critical design decisions
Rewrote and implemented vulnerability management for existing accredited systems
Managed application patches, data backup, security changes and network configuration
Managed 5 external computer consultants and vendors

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Initiated processing strategies to fulfill department analyst requirements. Designed and built a 200TB local storage solution, saving over a million dollars in purchasing and maintenance costs. Designed, purchased, and accredited a Red Hat Linux high compute cluster for operation in the Enterprise. This improved analytical processing time for big data from 30 hours to 30 minutes.
highlights: Designed 200TB local storage saving a million dollars in purchasing and maintenance costs
Designed, purchased, and accredited a Red Hat Linux high compute cluster for operation in the Enterprise

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Improved corporate and client communications and processing requirements. Resulted in the design, build and deployment of 3 Enterprise network solutions. Documented system layouts, wiring diagrams and addressing schema to understand layouts and made informed solutions to upper management.
highlights: Designed, built, and deployed 3 Enterprise network solutions
